Interface UserServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface UserServiceInterface

  • Method Details

    • findAllUsers

      List<UserDTO> findAllUsers()
      Get all the User entities from the UserRepository converted into DTOs.
      Returns:
      the list of users from the database, converted to DTOs

    • findAllUsersByTokensAscending

      List<UserDTO> findAllUsersByTokensAscending()
      Get all User entities from the UserRepository converted into DTOs, ordered ASCENDING by amount of tokens
      Returns:
      the list of users, converted to DTOs and sorted ascending

    • findAllUsersByTokensDescending

      List<UserDTO> findAllUsersByTokensDescending()
      Get all User entities from the UserRepository converted into DTOs, ordered ASCENDING by amount of tokens
      Returns:
      the list of users, converted to DTOs and sorted descending

    • findUserById

      User findUserById(Long id)
      Get User object from database if it matches the id argument given.
      Parameters:
      id - the id by which to search the user
      Returns:
      the user if found, else throws a RunTimeException

    • findUserByEmail

      User findUserByEmail(String email)
      Get User entity from database if it matches the email argument given.
      Parameters:
      email - the email by which to search the user
      Returns:
      the user if found, else will return null

    • findUserByUsername

      User findUserByUsername(String username)
      Get User entity from database if it matches the username argument given
      Parameters:
      username - the username by which to search the user
      Returns:
      the user if found, else will return null

    • saveUser

      void saveUser(UserDTO userDTO)
      Creates a new User entity and sets its values according to the DTO, then persists it.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO which will be saved as a User into the database

    • removeUserById

      void removeUserById(Long id)
      Removes a User from the database if it matches the id argument given
      Parameters:
      id - the id by which to search and remove the user

    • giveReward

      void giveReward(User user, int tokens)
      Adds tokens to a User entity and saves the changes. Checks for badges.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who will receive the tokens
      tokens - the tokens to be given to the user

    • takeReward

      void takeReward(String username, int tokens)
      Takes tokens from a User entity and saves the changes. Checks for badges.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who will lose the tokens
      tokens - the tokens to be taken from the user
